channel.title: FIFA on Charlie Song
channel.description: Recent content in FIFA on Charlie Song

item.title: FIFA19 Player Value
item.description: In this project I tried to build a model to explain and predict the “Value” of a soccer player given his attributes, initially I build models using traditional regression methods: Ordinary Least Squares Ridge Regression LASSO Regression Elastic Net Later on I used a relatively new method: XGBoost XGBoost out performed all the regression models earlier. In the end I took a closer look at the XGBoost model and attempt to find out which attributes are more important in determining a player’s value.
